entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The group of people who are enemies of Harry Potter and his friends. They were distracted by the appearance of the members of the Order.

entities.name: order
entities.description: A group of people who are allies of Harry Potter and his friends. They were raining spells down upon the Death Eaters.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story. He could see Neville crawling along through the flashes of light and darting bodies.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A friend of Harry Potter's who was crawling along on the sunken floor. He was trying to pull himself up when Harry reached him.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: A friend of Harry Potter's who was still fighting the brain when Neville left.

relationships.description: Harry helped Neville by reaching him and asking if he was okay.
Harry was concerned about Ron's safety, as he asked Neville if Ron was all right.
